org.drools.planner.examples.ras2012.model

Class ItineraryAssignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drools.planner.examples.ras2012.model.ItineraryAssignment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public final class ItineraryAssignment
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    Contains an Itinerary for a particular Train on a particular Route.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ItineraryAssignment

        public ItineraryAssignment(Train t,
                   ProblemSolution solution)
        Create a new instance. Won't assign any Route to the Train.
        Parameters:
        t - The train this instance should hold.
        maintenances - The maintenance windows from the Territory.

    • Method Detail

      • clone

        public ItineraryAssignment clone()
        Deep-clone the object, creating a new schedule in the process. That's actually very important, otherwise score corruption will occur.
        Overrides:
        clone in class Object

      • getItinerary

        public Itinerary getItinerary()
        Retrieves the schedule for a given train and route.
        Returns:
        The schedule.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - When hasn't been called on the object.

      • getRoute

        public Route getRoute()

      • getRoutes

        public Collection<Route> getRoutes()

      • getTrain

        public Train getTrain()

      • getWaitTimeAssignments

        public Collection<WaitTimeAssignment> getWaitTimeAssignments()
        Calculates the possible wait times for every wait point on the route. Will be used by WaitTimeAssignmentFactory to assemble all the valid moves. See getWaitTimeAssignments() for the rules by which a wait time is generated.
        Returns:
        A collection of all the valid wait points and wait times.

      • setRoute

        public void setRoute(Route route)
        Set a route for the train. This will in turn create a new schedule (see Itinerary).
        Parameters:
        route - A route to assign the train to.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - When route is null.

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
